content.question: Which of the following beliefs did the Romans hold about the Fates (Fatis, line 4)?

choices.label: The Fates were the goddesses of death and suffering.
The Fates were three male gods who controlled time.
The Fates controlled the weather and other natural events.
The Fates determined what humans would endure in their lives.

content.answer: The Fates determined what humans would endure in their lives.
